movie.title: The Other Boleyn Girl
movie.plot: A sumptuous and sensual tale of intrigue, romance and betrayal set against the backdrop of a defining moment in European history: two beautiful sisters, Anne and Mary Boleyn, driven by their family's blind ambition, compete for the love of the handsome and passionate King Henry VIII.

events.title: the "Silent Sentinels" are abused in what has been named the "Night of Terror"

movie.title: Iron Jawed Angels
movie.plot: Defiant young activists take the women's suffrage movement by storm, putting their lives at risk to help American women win the right to vote.
movie.awards: Won 1 Golden Globe. Another 3 wins & 27 nominations.

movie.title: We Were Soldiers
movie.plot: The story of the first major battle of the American phase of the Vietnam War and the soldiers on both sides that fought it.

studios.title: Motion Picture Production GmbH & Co. Erste KG

events.title: Southern Airways Flight 932 crashes, killing 37 members of the Marshall University football team

movie.title: We Are Marshall
movie.plot: In November, 1970, virtually the entire football team and coaches of Marshall University (Huntington, W.V.) die in a plane crash. That spring, led by Nate Ruffin, a player who was ill and missed the fatal flight, students rally to convince the board of governors to play the 1971 season. The college president, Don Dedman, must find a coach, who then must find players. They petition the NCAA to allow freshmen to play, and coach Jack Lengyel motivates and leads young players at the same time that he reexamines the Lombardi creed that winning is the only thing. The father and the fiancée of a player who died find strength to move on. Can Marshall win even one game in 1971?

events.title: after a hit is put out on the Green Hornet, the bodies of seven people wearing green are found

movie.title: The Green Hornet
movie.plot: Britt Reid (Seth Rogen), the heir to the largest newspaper fortune in Los Angeles, is a spoiled playboy who has been, thus far, happy to lead an aimless life. After his father (Tom Wilkinson) dies, Britt meets Kato (Jay Chou), a resourceful company employee. Realizing that they have the talent and resources to make something of their lives, Britt and Kato join forces as costumed crime-fighters to bring down the city's most-powerful criminal, Chudnofsky (Christoph Waltz).

movie.title: Paranormal Activity 4
movie.plot: It has been five years since the disappearance of Katie and Hunter, and a suburban family witness strange events in their neighborhood when a woman and a mysterious child move in.
